vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.33;
son of: Jonathan (H3129);
brother of: Peleth (H6431H)
§ Zaza = "brightness" or "fulness"
one of the sons of Jonathan, descendant of Jerahmeel
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Jerahmeel; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
撒薩 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "明亮" 或 "完整"
約拿單的眾子之一, 耶拉篾的後裔 (代上2:33)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
撒萨 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "明亮" 或 "完整"
约拿单的众子之一, 耶拉篾的后裔 (代上2:33)
